hero_title: Making Sense of Work with AI
hero_subtitle: Intelligent solutions that transform how you work

sections.title: About Sensework
sections.content: We build AI-powered tools that help teams work smarter, not harder. Our solutions are designed to integrate seamlessly into your existing workflows.

sections.title: Our Approach
sections.content: We believe AI should augment human intelligence, not replace it. Our tools are built to enhance decision-making, automate repetitive tasks, and unlock insights from your data.

features.title: Human-Centered AI
features.description: Solutions designed with people in mind

features.title: Seamless Integration
features.description: Works with your existing tools and processes
